headline: Ad Watch: Fact-checking ad attacking Republican US Senate candidate Dr. Mehmet Oz
author: Matt Barcaro
sentences: We're fact-checking the ads, and we begin with an ad attacking Dr. Mehmet Oz's bid for the Republican nomination for U.S. Senate.
You've likely noticed a lot of political ads on WGAL as candidates try to break from the pack ahead of the May primary.
In an 8 On Your Side investigation, WGAL News 8's Matt Barcaro checked the claims.
Pennsylvania Supreme Court keeps mail-in voting law in place, at least for now
